Konstantinos Patelis


Credit Risk Analytics & Stress Testing


   






Hey there! My name is Konstantinos Patelis, welcome to my blog!
Originally from Athens, I finished my studies in Mechanical Engineering at the National Technical University of Athens, where I received my Masterâ€™s equivalent diploma in 2015. One year later I moved to Zurich to study Management and Economics at ETH and in 2017 I started working in the risk analytics space. Currently, Iâ€™m working in credit risk analytics focusing on combined stress testing.

One of the purposes of this blog is to showcase tools to replace traditional software used in enterprises in order to automate common tasks and unlock potential for value creation.
